Description.Name: barramedasBlackguards
Description.Details: Sanlucar saw the opportunity to profit from the chaos that was the Aurigan Civil War. The Barrameda name can be traced back as far as the early 13th Century on Terra. Sanlucar has always fancied himself a decendant of the ancient Spanish Toreadors. Their emblem takes the Winged Bull from the Coat of arms of Sanl√∫car de Barrameda
